rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports on detection locations, lacking vivid language.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports detections but lacks explicit calming language or reassurance.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports a fact (detection) but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports detection locations, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports detections, not speculation about future relief or improvement.
No direct quote or attributed statement present.
No explicit framing cues; facts presented factually, defaulting to Neutral.
